title: Scene Transition Schema
description: Standardized enumeration of transition types between scenes in The Shadow Team Chronicles universe.

descriptions.description: Detailed explanations of each transition type (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

hard_cut.description: An immediate, abrupt shift between scenes with no transitional elements.

fade_to_black.description: A gradual diminishing of the scene, often indicating passage of time or emotional finality.

time_lapse.description: A transition that explicitly indicates the passage of time between scenes.

location_shift.description: A transition focused on movement between different physical settings.

perspective_change.description: A transition that shifts the narrative viewpoint from one character to another.

flashback_entry.description: A transition that moves from present to past narrative time.

flashback_exit.description: A transition that returns from past to present narrative time.

dream_sequence_entry.description: A transition that moves from waking reality to dream state.

dream_sequence_exit.description: A transition that returns from dream state to waking reality.

thematic_bridge.description: A transition based on thematic elements, connecting scenes through ideas rather than time/space.

sensory_shift.description: A transition based on sensory experience, such as a sound or visual element that carries between scenes.

memory_trigger.description: A transition initiated by a character recalling or being reminded of past events.

parallel_action.description: A transition that indicates simultaneous events happening in different locations.

environmental_transition.description: A transition driven by environmental changes like weather, lighting, or atmosphere.
